```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(infer)
```

```{r}
ames <- read.csv("ames.csv")
ames
```
```{r}
ames <- clean_names(ames)
ames
```
```{r}
glimpse(ames)
```

```{r}
hist <- ames %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = sale_price)) +
  geom_histogram()
hist
```

```{r}
mean_ames <- mean(ames$sale_price)
mean_ames
```

```{r}

ames_plot <- ames %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = sale_price)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), col = "white") +
  stat_function(
    fun = dnorm, 
    args = list(
      mean = mean(ames$sale_price), 
      sd = sd(ames$sale_price)
    ),
    col = "red"
  )
ames_plot
```

```{r}
library(infer)
rep_sample_200 <- telco %>%
  rep_sample_n(size = 200, reps = 10000) %>%
  group_by(replicate) %>%
  summarise(
    mean_tenure = mean(tenure)
  ) 

rep_sample_200 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = mean_tenure)) +
  geom_histogram(col = "white")
```


```{r}
ames %>%
  summarise(stderr = sd(mean_))
```
